summaryOfNewsArticle: Former President Joe Biden has completed a course of radiation therapy for an aggressive form of prostate cancer that had spread to his bones. This follows earlier treatments, including a pill regimen and Mohs surgery for skin cancer. The news was shared publicly by his daughter, Ashley Biden, who posted a video and photo celebrating the milestone, thanking the medical staff at Penn Medicine Radiation Oncology. While the specifics of future treatment remain unclear, Biden has maintained a positive outlook, stating he believes they can 'beat this.' The public's attention on his health highlights broader concerns about leadership, transparency, and cancer treatment in high-profile individuals.
